{PAWN_nameDef}' immune system is severely deficient, {PAWN_pronoun} immunity is almost non-existent, and almost any small illness can kill {PAWN_possessive}.
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_2.degreeDatas.0.label: mania
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_2.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is manic and hard to control {PAWN_possessive} own spirit, often venting {PAWN_possessive} anger for no reason one the people around.
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_NoValue.degreeDatas.0.label: worthless
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_NoValue.degreeDatas.0.descrip: For unknown reasons, no matter what amazing achievements {PAWN_nameDef} makes, the value of {PAWN_pronoun} will not change in the slightest, and even in the slave market no one is willing to buy {PAWN_pronoun}.
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_4.degreeDatas.0.label: vulnerable to cold
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_4.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has weak resistance to cold environment and is easily frostbitten.
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_5.degreeDatas.0.label: vulnerable to heat
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_5.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has weak resistance to heat and burns easily.
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_Nonsense.degreeDatas.0.label: troll
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_Nonsense.degreeDatas.0.descri: {PAWN_nameDef} likes to get pleasure by arguing with others, and always tends to ignore or distort the logic of others to provoke them.
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_9.degreeDatas.0.label: dyscalculia
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_9.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has some flaws in the part of the brain that is used to do math and tasks that involve math, and each {PAWN_pronoun} tries to calculate something, {PAWN_pronoun} always makes a little mistake somewhere.
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_10.degreeDatas.0.label: deformed body
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_10.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef}'s body is like the scene of a serious car accident, and {PAWN_pronoun} is weaker than ordinary people in all aspects due to the deformity of his limbs.
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_12.degreeDatas.0.label: arrogant
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_12.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a high self-esteem and thinks that {PAWN_pronoun} knows everything and does not need to learn.
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_14.degreeDatas.0.label: lust
LanguageData.Ling_NoGod_14.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is greedy for lust and will feel miserable if {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't have multiple lovers.
